title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') as a filter in a table, an error message is thrown.
OB:
When saving and previewing the report, an error occurs on the report page. There is an error in table 'table8':
- Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s))
- Detail: An error occurred during data type conversion. The value cannot be converted to a date, resulting in the error message 'Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.'
EB: When saving and previewing the report, the filter should work without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the report that contains a table.
2. Set the filter value to 'new Date('3/2/2005')'.
3. Save and preview the report.
4. Observe the error message in the table.
